T210 Series 3 cards for sale:
Updated with reduced prices on remaining cards.


1.Hinninger, Shreveport – P/F, pinhole. $18.00
2.Davis, OKC – G, stain on reverse.  ON HOLD
3.Walsh, OKC – P/F, pinhole $25.00
4.Smith, Shreveport – Possible old trim. Sold as altered. $9.00
5.Harper, Shreveport – G/VG  ON HOLD
6.Stadeli, Shreveport – VG+  ON HOLD
7.Cowan, Shreveport – Possible top edge old trim. Sold as altered. $9.00
8.Conaway, Waco – P. $8.00
9.Bandy, OKC – P/F, pinhole $18.00
10.Wickenhofer, Houston P/G, paper loss on reverse.  ON HOLD
11.Barenkemp, Shreveport VG -  ON HOLD
13.Robertson, Dallas – P $10.00
15.[S]Spangler, Galveston – card is two pieces put back together with vintage “PAID” labels[/S] SOLD
19.Blue, Waco – P/F pinhole $18.00
20.Harrison, Waco – VG+  ON HOLD
25.[S]Donnelley, Galveston - card is also in two pieces put back together with vintage “PAID” labels[/S]  SOLD


F/F Paypal preferred. Feel free to make an offer for one card, multiple cards or all cards in one lot. Thanks!
Lowered the prices on remaining available cards
I will take smith and cowan
Sent a PM for Blue. I'll take it if it's still available.

Andy,

Looks like you still have four listed as available at $10 or less. I’ll take them all is still available. 

Thanks,
-kin

Andy -
Attempted to PM about cards paid on 19th but your inbox is full.  Have these cards shipped?

Tom

I paid on the 12th...and no response to my shipping inquiry.  Hope everything is all right over there.

Mac
I did receive my cards from Andy if that helps any. I hope this works out for you.
I sent multiple PM's and e-mails a couple of weeks ago and never got a response.  I likewise hope that everything is okay!
And I'll still take Blue if you're reading this.

Not to pile on here, but I paid for three cards on June 9th and haven't received anything or a response to my email yet.  It also looks like I wanted three cards that Kin had asked about on May 25th above.  They were all $10 or less.  So if Kin said he would take them on the 25th, then I should've been told they weren't available when I asked about them on June 9th.  But I received images of them from Andy when I asked about them and then paid for them that night.  Anyways, like others have said, I hope everything is ok with Andy.
